Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
The Player class models the player of the game Eriantys with its nickname, its school board and its deck of assistant cards

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, TowerColor colorOfTowers, int numPlayers, Bag bag)
      Constructs a Player with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the Player
      colorOfTowers - the color of the towers of the player
      numPlayers - the number of players in the game
      bag - the Bag from which to draw the initial students

  • Method Details

    • pay

      public void pay(int amount)
      The method pay decreases the coins in chamber by the number given by parameter
      Parameters:
      amount - the number of coins to remove from chamber

    • chooseCard

      public boolean chooseCard(Card c)
      The method chooseCard removes the Card given by parameter from the deck and sets the currCard attribute to the same Card
      Parameters:
      c - the Card to remove from the Deck and to which to set the variable currCard
      Returns:
      true if the Deck did contain c, false if it didn't

    • resetCurrCard

      public void resetCurrCard()
      The method resetCurrCard sets currCard to null

    • addTowers

      public void addTowers(int n)
      The method addTowers increases the variable numberOfTowers
      Parameters:
      n - the amount of towers to add

    • removeTowers

      public void removeTowers(int n)
      The method removeTowers decreases the variable numberOfTowers
      Parameters:
      n - the amount of towers to remove
